desc: OVM Seeds offers flower, herb, and vegetable seeds to professional growers and home gardeners. Our speciality is bulk seed quantities at affordable price and always free USA shipping.  We ship worldwide at low flat shipping rate, and free international shipping is available when order minimum 100 USD is met.
